data.title: Westfield Stratford City Westfield Stratford City
meta_keywords: Westfield Stratford City Westfield Stratford City
data.meta_description: Shop, eat and play at more than 300 retailers at Westfield Stratford City! | The ultimate destination for food, fashion and fun! | See opening hours and plan your visit online
data.text:
Westfield Stratford City boasts 250 shops and around 80 dining options, delivering an exceptional shopping experience, thanks to its superb location and accessible, high-quality architectural design.

The Westfield centre is home to over 300 brands, including renowned names like John Lewis, Marks & Spencer, and Waitrose.

Westfield Stratford City is a leading leisure destination in London.

Our shopping centre offers all the facilities you need for a pleasant day out. From a simple caf√© to international restaurants, you're bound to find a spot to suit your taste.

Featuring more than 28 restaurants, you can also savour cuisine from around the world and take a shopping break with a latte or a sweet treat. To round off a fantastic day out, you can either head to the food court on the ground floor, featuring popular operators, or the Mezzanine, a casual dining area with some of the UK's finest restaurants.

Children are well-catered for too, with child-friendly restaurants, shops, and playgrounds. This is your chance to reward them for their good behaviour during the shopping trip!

We're the ultimate destination for fun, housing the UK's largest All-Star Lanes bowling alley. Our 20-screen Vue cinema is fully digital and stands as one of the largest and most innovative in Europe. Don't forget to try your luck at Aspers Casino, the UK's largest. You can even partake in a fully immersive baseball celebration! And, be sure not to miss the upcoming events celebrating fashion and music.

Westfield Stratford City is a place where every corner promises fun and adventure. Don't delay any longer and enjoy a day filled with fun at Westfield Stratford City!
